title: Large-Scale Collaborative Writing Competency Enhancement Training Program for Greek Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Greek grammar and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Teacher professional development program applying MOOCs and collaborative learning methodologies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with three or more peers using Google Docs' real-time features (comments, suggestion mode, version history) to draft a 1,000+ character service scenario document and submit a collaborative writing activity plan incorporating feedback processes.

Learners can establish an online community platform (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams) for teacher knowledge sharing within four weeks, post discussion topics at least twice weekly, engage in knowledge-sharing activities with five or more peer teachers, and achieve community activation metrics (70%+ participation, 20+ posts).
Learners cultivate the ability to develop digital educational scenarios to enhance learner engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
